source.name: Arkansas Charities
source.description: Use the searchable the database or browse the list of the 275,000 organizations that the IRS says are no longer tax-exempt because they did not file legally required documents. The IRS announced the revocations on June 8.

datasets.name: CO groups that lost tax exempt status
datasets.description:
Use the searchable the database or browse the list of the 275,000 organizations that the IRS says are no longer tax-exempt because they did not file legally required documents. The IRS announced the revocations on June 8.

Note: Some organizations say they are wrongly on the list because of errors by the IRS. Donors should be careful not to rely solely on this list but should check with the organization and the IRS first. You can report mistakes on the list by sending us an e-mail at: editor@philanthropy.com
